select dayhh-nvl(dd,0) from ( select fk_empid,worktype,resisterdaytime ,ROUND((TO_DATE( case when TO_DATE( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'HH24:MI:SS') > TO_DATE( '18:00:00' , 'HH24:MI:SS')then '17:00:00' when TO_DATE( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'HH24:MI:SS') < TO_DATE( '12:00:00' , 'HH24:MI:SS') then to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) when TO_DATE( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE( '12:00:00' , 'HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'HH24:MI:SS') <= TO_DATE( '13:00:00' , 'HH24:MI:SS') then '12:00:00' else to_char(resisterdaytime- to_dsinterval('000 01:00:00'),'hh24:mi:ss' ) end , 'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE( '09:00:00' , 'HH24:MI:SS') ) * 24 , 2) AS dayhh from tbl_workhistory where (worktype =5 and fk_empid =#{empid} )and( to_char(resisterdaytime,'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = #{sysdate} )
) a join ( select fk_empid,worktype, resisterdaytime , case
when (worktype=2 and LEAD(worktype ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime) in(1,3,4) ) and( to_date(to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ),'hh24:mi:ss') < to_date('12:00:00','hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(LEAD(to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime),'hh24:mi:ss' ) > to_date('13:00:00','hh24:mi:ss')) then ROUND((to_date(LEAD(to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime),'hh24:mi:ss' ) - to_date( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'hh24:mi:ss') ) * 24 , 2) -1
when( worktype=2 and LEAD(worktype ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime) in(1,3,4) ) then ROUND((to_date(LEAD(to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime),'hh24:mi:ss' ) - to_date( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ), 'hh24:mi:ss') ) * 24 , 2)
when( worktype=2 and LEAD(worktype ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime) not in(1,3,4) ) and to_date(to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ),'hh24:mi:ss') < to_date('12:00:00','hh24:mi:ss') then ROUND((to_date ('18:00:00', 'hh24:mi:ss' ) - to_date( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) ,'hh24:mi:ss') ) * 24 , 2) -1
when worktype=2 and LEAD(worktype ) OVER(ORDER BY resisterdaytime) not in(1,3,4) then ROUND((to_date ('18:00:00', 'hh24:mi:ss' ) - to_date( to_char(resisterdaytime,'hh24:mi:ss' ) ,'hh24:mi:ss') ) * 24 , 2)
end as dd from tbl_workhistory where fk_empid =#{empid} and to_char(resisterdaytime,'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = #{sysdate} order by resisterdaytime )b on to_char(a.resisterdaytime,'yyyy-mm-dd' ) = to_char(b.resisterdaytime,'yyyy-mm-dd' ) where dd is not null

,ROUND (( TO_DATE(overtimeend, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss' )-TO_DATE(overtimestart, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss' )) * 24 , 2) as hour

)workplus join
